response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. Given its worth to you, we are confident it will be a valuable addition to your company. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This offer is designed to provide you with an opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. We understand the importance of making strategic investments in your business, and we trust that this product will contribute to your long-term success. Should you decide to proceed, please let us know, and we will arrange for immediate delivery and support to ensure a smooth transition. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1150000}
